name: Unknown
description: For music that has no genre assigned.

name: Alternative rock
description: Calmer variant of rock. Has a focus on vibes.

name: Ambient
description: Music that can easily fade into the background. Calming stuff!

name: Breakbeat
description: A genre of electronic music characterized by the use of breaks, often sampled from earlier recordings in funk, jazz, and R&B, for the main rhythm.

name: Chillstep
description: A subgenre of dubstep that focuses on a more melodic and relaxing sound.

name: Classical
description: Lots of traditional instruments, and a focus on the melody.

name: Classical crossover
description: A genre that combines classical music with other genres. Usually crossed with electronic.

name: Complextro
description: A subgenre of electro house characterized by a more complex, intricate and experimental sound.

name: Contemporary rhythm and blues
description: A genre that combines elements of rhythm and blues, soul, funk, pop, hip hop and dance.

name: Dance pop
description: Basically just popular dance music.

name: Deep house
description: A subgenre of house music characterised by deep basslines and soulful vocals.

name: Disco
description: A genre of dance music has a wide room sound, repetition, and is easy to dance to.

name: Downtempo
description: A genre of electronic music similar to ambient, but has a bit more going on. Very relaxing still.

name: Drum and bass
description: Does it have drums? Does it have bass?

name: Dubstep
description: A genre of electronic dance music that goes brooooooohhhhhh bru- reaeeeeee vrom vrrrrooooooooooooooooooooooo-

name: Easy listening
description: A genre of music that is easy to listen to. Usually instrumental. May have some vocals.

name: Electro house
description: Very 'electric' sounding. Has that same house structure but expresses mostly synthetic instruments.

name: Electro swing
description: A genre of music that combines the influence of vintage or modern swing and jazz mixed with house, hip hop, and EDM.

name: Electronic
description: A genre of music that is made with electronic instruments.

name: Electronic body synth
description: Repetitive beat with a progressive melody. Usually hard stuff with a medium drop.

name: Electropop
description: If there was a pop house, this would be it. Very strong emphasis on the vocals.

name: Funk
description: Characterized by a strong rhythmic groove of a bassline and drumbeat with electric bass guitars, drums, and often keyboards.

name: Future bass
description: Electronic music. Very long bass notes. Usually has a very strong drop.

name: Future funk
description: A genre of music that combines elements of funk, disco, house and synthwave. Usually in Japanese 日本語.

name: Future house
description: High notes, high energy, and a strong drop. Usually happy or motivational.

name: Ghetto house
description: Trashy lyrics, house vibes, usually mixed with pop music and many rogue samples from pop culture.

name: Glitch hop
description: Sounds like stuff from indie games. Decent pace, strong beat, low bitrate sound. If low-poly was a genre this would be it.

name: Hard rock
description: Despite its name, it has nothing to do with rocks. Usually high energy, motivational, and hard. Guitars, drums, vocals!

name: Hardbass
description: сука блять гопник

name: Hardcore
description: Electronic music that is very hard. Usually has a strong beat and a strong drop. Not to be confused with dubstep.

name: Hip hop
description: Characterized by a rhythmic vocal style which is accompanied by backing beats. If rhythm and blues had a energetic child that smoked weed.

name: Hip hop rap
description: Hip hop that has a strong focus on the vocals and rhythmic structure of said vocals. If poems had backing beats.

name: House
description: Electronic dance music characterized by a repetitive four on the floor beat and a tempo of 120 to 130 beats per minute.

name: Jazz
description: Calm, usually instrumental, can have vocals. Usually has a piano and drums played softly.

name: Jungle
description: Like drum and bass if it was made in the jungle and the jungle was on fire.

name: Liquid drum and bass
description: A subgenre of drum and bass that you would chill to. Usually quite repetitive, predictable, and with no strong drops.

name: Lofi
description: Very relaxing and slow. A subgenre of hip hop that has an emphasis on the vibe. Almost like ambient and downtempo but in the realm of hip hop.

name: Ambient lofi
description: An even slower variant of lofi with a focus on the ambient side of things. May have human sounds or a rare spoken line but has no vocals.

name: Lofi house
description: Nostalgic house. Usually has pop culture samples and has a strong focus on vibe.

name: Minimal techno
description: A subgenre of techno that has minimal instruments. Progressive and repetitive.

name: Neo-soul
description: A subgenre of soul that has modern elements in it such as synthetic instruments and reverberations.

name: New-age
description: What you may imagine a gypsy or witch in the woods to listen to and create. Experimental house.

name: Nightcore
description: High pitch. Anime background. Sped-up high energy music. Usually in the form of remixes of pop, dance, or house music.

name: Nu-disco
description: A subgenre of disco that has a modern twist to it. Still repetitive and easy to dance to but has synthetic instruments and bass.

name: Outrun
description: The cyberpunk's genre. A subgenre of synthwave that has a focus on a repetitive beat. Usually associated with the colours red and black.

name: Phonk
description: Lots of cowbell. High energy and heavy. Anime or cars background. Usually has male vocals, deep bass and drums, and is wet.

name: Pop
description: Usually acoustic or electronic. Has a strong focus on the vocals and the melody. Usually has a strong beat and is sung by the general public.

name: Progressive house
description: A subgenre of house that slowly progresses the song. Usually predictable.

name: Rhythm and blues
description: Acoustic sounds, soulful, passionate, with a focus on what is being said.

name: Soul
description: A calmer and more relaxing subgenre of rhythm and blues that has a focus on the soulful vocals and the melody. Very passionate.

name: Rock
description: I already made the joke once. Acoustic, guitars, drums, vocals, and a strong beat.

name: Slowed
description: Music that has intentionally been slowed down to create a more relaxing vibe. Pretty much the inverse of nightcore.

name: Speedcore, hardcore, breakcore
description: Very fast, very hard, very loud.

name: Synth-pop
description: Synthwave but with an emphasis on the vocals instead of the synths.

name: Synthwave
description: A subgenre of electronic music that has a focus on the synths. Usually has a retro vibe to it.

name: Techno
description: A subgenre of electronic music that has a focus on the beat. Usually repetitive and progressive.

name: Trance
description: Electronic music that is supposed to put you into a trance with its repetitiveness and progressive nature.

name: Tropical house
description: A subgenre of house that has a focus on the tropical vibe. Steel drums, wooden instruments, stuff you would hear on an island vacation if the island were a nightclub.

name: Vaporwave
description: The new synthwave but for advertisements and pop culture. Focus on 2000s computer's aesthetics and the vibe. Usually not too predictable due to it being semi-experimental.
